learning_objective: Discuss computing technologies that have changed the world, and express how those technologies influence, and are influenced by, cultural practices.
question_str:
{
    "Question": "Alex, a gymnastics enthusiast, has been watching the sport evolve over the years. They noticed that there has been a drastic change in scoring methodology with the introduction of a computerized scoring system. The system considers not just the completion of the exercise, but also the complexity of the technique and the level of execution. What was a significant influence of the integration of this computer technology in Gymnastics?",
    "Answer1": "The athletes started focusing only on perfecting the landing of each technique to maximize their score.",
    "Answer2": "The athletes started exploring more complex techniques in their routines to score higher.",
    "Answer3": "The athletes started delivering crowd-pleasing performances that had less complex techniques but more aesthetics.",
    "Answer4": "The athletes started lobbying for their scores to be based on their personal records and not just one performance.",
    "CorrectAnswer": "2",
    "Explanation": "The introduction of the computerized scoring system placed more emphasis on the complexity of the techniques and the level of execution. As a result, athletes, to maximize their scores, started incorporating more complex techniques in their routines. This was a significant shift in the sport, introducing more challenging and innovative techniques."
}
